settings.title: Give the Gift of a Unique Bonsai Workshop Experience

settings.text: Surprise your loved ones with a Bonsai Bar gift cardâ€”perfect for anyone who loves plants, creativity, and unforgettable experiences! Bonsai Bar gift cards open the door to hands-on bonsai workshops in fun, social settings across the U.S., where participants can relax, sip drinks, and create their own bonsai tree with the guidance of expert instructors. Ideal for birthdays, anniversaries, date nights, or simply a creative day out, these gift cards offer a one-of-a-kind experience that brings together art, nature, and relaxation. Available in locations nationwide, a Bonsai Bar gift card makes a thoughtful, unique gift for plant enthusiasts, couples, and groups alike.

Sorry. We are transferring our tickets and gift cards to a new service, gift cards will not be available at this time.

We plan for them to be back before the start of the holiday season.
